name: Spielen.com(agames.com) Black
description:
New!!!
Black Style for http://www.spielen.com
      and       http://agames.com
css:
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);
/*=======================================*/
/* Spielen.com Wide BlackForest */
/* Bart Simpson */
/* http://userstyles.org/users/
/*=======================================*/
@-moz-document domain("www.spielen.com"),
               domain("agames.com") {

/*=======================================*/
/* Display None */
/*
#content,
#bestofanswerscontent,
#bestofanswerscontent .roundoff,
#just-middle,
.connections_right,

*/
.ads,
.doc-layout-head a img,
.ovt,
.yschbox,
.yshp_ad ,
.yshp_ad_header,
.yshp_ad_o_e,
.yshp_ad_o_e .link,
.yshp_ad_o_e img,
.yshp_ad_o_e u,
.yshp_ad_o_e ,
.yshp_ad_o_e ,

#ad-content,
#y-ks-banner,
#y-ks-mini-banner,
#yschsec,

html > body > a > img,
html > body > table > tbody > tr > td > iframe,
html > body > table > tbody > tr > td > a > img,

[class="ad"],
[class="ad_slug"],
[class="ad_slug"] img,
[class="ad_slug_table"],
[class="ad_slug_tube"],
[class="marketing-ad mod"],
[class="ygrp-mon"],

[id="ad"],
[id='errorPageContainer'],
[id="H2_div"],
[id="H3_div"],
[id="LREC"],
[id="swPane"],
[id="welcomeAdsContainer"],
[id="yan-banner"],
[id="yan-sponsored"],
[id="ygma"] table,
[id="ymgl-north-wrapper"],
[id="ypfl-links"],
[id="ypfl-lrec-ad"]
 {
 display: none !important;
 }
/*=======================================*/


/*=======================================*/
/* Images Preferred */

ul.user-profile-image-area
 {
 color: #bbb !important;
 background-color: transparent !important;
 border-left-color: #020 !important;
 border-right-color: #020 !important;
 border-bottom-color: #020 !important;
 border-right-color: #020 !important;
 font-weight: normal !important;
}
/*=======================================*/


/*=======================================*/
/* Clear Skies */
.forecast-module #forecast-temperature ul li,
.forecast-module #forecast-temperature ul li a
 {
 color: #000 !important;
 background-color: transparent !important;
 }
/*=======================================*/


/*=======================================*/
[class="inputtext"]
 {
 background-color: #9a9 !important;
 }
/*=======================================*/


/*=======================================*/
/* FlagHoles */
[class="answer low-rating"],
[class="answer-util disabled"]
 {
 background-color: #300 !important;
 background-image: none !important;
 }
/*=======================================*/


/*=======================================*/
/* Light Gray/Global Text */
*,

#management-nav ul li,
#patabs li .icon strong,
#patabs li a.details b,
#patabs li.tab-on a.details b,
#patabs ul.patabs li,
#today p,
#weatherpreview dd,
#weatherpreview .high strong,
#weatherpreview .low strong,
#yan-edit-question a,
#yan-starthis a span, #yan-starthis .cannot-star span,
#ygma *,
#ygrp_join_grp h3,
#ygunav strong,
#ymgl-masthead h1 span strong,
#yls-gl-neighborhood h4,
#yschres .yschspns li em,
#yschres .yschurl,

.caption em,
.form-sub-label,
.ft-content .rating-readonly,
.headerControl,
.inputtext,
.join_grp_prefs,
.messageSubject,
.p-tip,
.qsfl span,
.rating-area .rating.negative span,
.rating-area .rating.positive span,
.s2,
.settings *,
.submit,
.ulmform #csz,
.ulmform input,
.ulmform label,

h1, h2, h3, h4,
iframe,
textarea,
A, P,

[class="caption"],
[class="char-count"],
[class="col-2 settings body-regular"],
[class="contTableResizerHotspot eResizeCursor"],
[class="ct"] strong,
[class="cut"],
[class="forcast"],
[class="high"],
[class="icon"],
[class="h1-regular"],
[class="fn"],
[class="level"],
[class="low"],
[class="memberwritten-regular link-1"],
[class="minor"],
[class="p-tip minor-regular"],
[class="snippet"] strong,
[class="star-count has-stars"],
[class="textLink"],
[class="time"],
[class="timestamp"],
[class="title"],
[class="ygrp-act"],
[class="ygrp-remaining"],
[class="yschurl"] b,

[id="0_shortcutson_label"],
[id="localulm"],
[id="messages_checkall"],
[id="messages_clearall"],
[id="Name_hdr"],
[id="searchp"],
[id="signout"],
[id="ygma"],
[id="ygmacx"],
[id="ygmagreeting"] #strong,
[id="ygrmgrtlinks"]
 {
 color: #bbb !important;
 }
/*=======================================*/


/*=======================================*/
/* Black Text */
#bar-answers-best,
#bar-answers-total, /* These are for the Answers profile page. */
#bar-questions-knowledge,
#bar-questions-open,

.forecast-module #forecast-temperature p,
.forecast-module dd,
.forecast-module dt,
.forecast-module em,
.forecast-module h3,

SPAN *,

[class="cta-ans-1"] *,
[class="rating negative"] *,
[class="rating positive"] *,
[class="starflagab-area"],
[class="txt"]
 {
 color: #000 !important;
 }
/*=======================================*/


/*=======================================*/
/* Welcome User Name */
#ygma strong,

[class="best-answer-notify"],
[class="star-count-has-stars"],

[id="up-member-cur-level"],
[id="up-member-num-points"],
[id="up-member-points-text"],
[id="username"]
 {
 color: #9c9 !important;
 font-weight: bolder !important;
 }
/*=======================================*/


/*=======================================*/
/* Assorted Link Handling */
a:hover, a:active { color: #0d0 !important}
a:visited { color: #f50 !important }
a:visited:hover { color: #ff3 !important; }

/* Yellow Links */
a:link,

[class="ygrp-add"] b,
[class="yshortcuts"]
 {
 color: #aa0 !important;
 }

/* Button Faces */
#mantle2 #mtl-btn,
#search .btn-more-2,
#ygma .ygbt,

button,
button.default,
container-0,
input.active,
input.button,

[class="alt-button"],
[class="btn-more-2"],
[class="button"],
[class="ygbt"],
[class="ygrp-button"],

[id="mtl-btn"]
 {
 color: #bbb !important;
 background-color: #020 !important;
 background-image: none !important;
 border-color: #040 !important;
/* padding-left-value: 4px !important;
 padding-right-value: 4px !important;*/
 }
/*=======================================*/


/*=======================================*/
/* Answer this question */
[class="textlink"],
 [
 class="cta-ans-1"] *|*:link
 {
 color: #00d
 }
/*=======================================*/


/*=======================================*/
/* Reporting Yamster */
#yan-text--bubble .bd,
#yan-text--bubble .bd div,
#yan-text--bubble .bd span,
#yan-text--bubble .ft,
#yan-text--bubble h1,
#yan-text--bubble h2,
#yan-text--bubble p,
#yan-text--bubble ul,

[class="bd"],
[class="ft"],
[class="mod"],

[id="bd"],
[id="yan-community"],
[id="yan-text-bubble"]
 {
 background-color: #010 !important;
 background-image: none !important;
 }
/*=======================================*/


/*=======================================*/
/* Black Imageless Backgrounds */
/* , li, body, td, img */
FORM, HTML, TEXTAREA,

.action-area-menu .heading,
.folderRow, .form,
.hd li.on em,

#aubg,
#categories ul /*Y*/,
#swPane, .pane, .plaque,

body,
dl.formfields dd,
input,
select,
spacer,
table,
td,
textarea,

.answer-hidden,
.h2.header,
.messagepane,
.tabBar,

[class="hd cta-guidelines"]
{
 background-color: #000 !important;
 background-image: none !important;
}
/*=======================================*/


/*=======================================*/
/* #y-body-green-knowledge-search { background-color: #000 !important } */
[class="question-title"]
 {
 color: #ff3 !important;
 font-weight: bold !important;
 font-size: 200% !important;
 background-color: #000 !important
 }

/*=======================================*/


/*=======================================*/
/* LightGreen Borders */
.profile-tabs ul li.selected a,
.promo h4,
.question-listing .attention a,

#trough

[class="action"],
[class="backinglframe"],
[class="c"],
[class="corner-top"],
[class="down"],
[class="icon"],
[class="l"],
[class="ls"],
[class="neoCheck neoCheck_off"],
[class="pa-alert-promo"],
[class="r"],
[class="rs"],
[class="selected"],

[id="buddylist"],
[id="doors-links"],
[id="musicpreview"],
[id="up-member-stats-border-right"],
[id="weatherpreview"]
 {
 color: #bb0 !important;
 background-color: #030 !important;
 background-image: none !important;
 border-left-color: #020 !important;
 border-right-color: #020 !important;
 border-bottom-color: #000 !important;
 border-right-color: #000 !important;
 font-weight: normal !important;
}
/*=======================================*/


/*=======================================*/
[class="star"]
 {
 background-color: #020 !important;
 }
/*=======================================*/


/*=======================================*/
/* DarkGreen Borders */
div.message-container,
dl.formfields dt,
tableHeadersWrapper,

.action-area-menu ul li a,
.corner-bottom,
.hd li.on,
.mail-friend a,
.md,
.panedivider,
.profile-tabs ul li a,
.profile-tabs ul li .left,
.profile-tabs ul li .right,
.sidebar-box,
.sidebar-box h2,
.site-tabs ul li,
.site-tabs ul li a,
.tabgraphic,
.wmod .bd,

#cat-undo,
#categories,
#doors li a,
#today .ft li.on a,
#y-ks-profile-widget,
#y-ks-profile-widget-container,
#yan-community form div div,
#yan-startthis a span, #yan-startthis .cannot-star span,
#ygma form,
#yls-hm-tabs,
#yls-hm-tabs .yui-content-child *,
#ymgl-inbox-menu .section .inbox li,
#ymgl-masthead h1 span,
#yan-save-question a,
#yui-main #yls-hm-main,

[id="todaybd"],
[id="todayft"],

}

/*=======================================*/
/* Green Flag Borders */

[class="yfbcommentpolicy"],
[id="yfbrl"],
[id="ygml-masthead"],
[id="ygrp-footer"],
[id="ygrp-links"],
[id="ygrp-sponsor-box"],
[id="ygrp-sponsor-grpsrch"],
[id="ygrp-srch-container"],
[id="ygsp"],
[id="ygsp"] input,
[id="y-ks-mantle"],
[id="yls-gl-ft"]
 {
 color: #bbb !important;
 background-color: #000 !important;
 background-image: none !important;
 border-color: #030 !important;
 font-weight: normal !important;
}
/*=======================================*/


/*=======================================*/
/* Yahoo! Headers */

/* Panel Borders */
#pabd { background-color: #474 !important }


[class="alt-button"] button, input[type="reset"],
input[type="button"], input[type="submit"]
{
 color:#bbb !important;
 background-color: #093 !important;
}

[type="cancel"] { background-color: #f90 !important }
/*=======================================*/


/*=======================================*/
/* Screen Dimensions */
/*1050*/
#y-ks-whole-page,
#y-body-green-knowledge-search,
#yan
 {
 width:1050px !important;
 }

/* 960 */
/* #y-body-green-knowledge-search #content #just-middle, */
#y-body-green-knowledge-search #content #just-middle
 {
 width: 960px !important;
 }
/*=======================================*/


/*=======================================*/
/* 755 */
#yan-answers,
#yan-answers h2,
#yan-content,
#yan-question,
#yan-question .subject,
#yan-question-tools,

.answer,
.answer util ul,
.qa-container,

dl.formfields dd,
dl.formfields dd div,
dl.formfields dd textarea,

[class="subject"]
 {
 width: 755px !important;
 }

/* 730 */
.answer.best,
.answer.best h2,
#yan-question h2,
#yan-question .hd
 {
 width: 730px !important;
 }

/* 715 */
#y-ks-header-container,
#ks-inline-search-container,
#yan-answers .hd,
#y-body-green-knowledge-search #content #middle,
#y-body-green-knowledge-search #content-right #middle,
#yan-question .additional-details,
#yan-question h2 .additional-details,
.answer-rating dd.desc,
.qa-container .content,
.qa-container div.reference,
.question-listing,
.utils-container
 {
 width: 715px !important;
 }


.question-listing .dotted-line,
.question-results .dotted-line
 {
 width: 710px !important;
 }


/* 700 */
#yan main .qa-container
 {
 width: 700px !important;
 }

/* 535 */
.inline-search-wrapper input.textbox
 {
 width: 535px !important;
 }

/* 225 */
.taxonomy-select
 {
 width: 225px !important;
 }

/* Answers Input Box */
[id='textarea2']
 {
 height: 300px !important;
 }

[id='moreCommentsContainer'] textarea,
[id='refer']
 {
 height: 150px !important;
 }
/*=======================================*/


/*=======================================*/
/* AutoMargins */
#boa,
#y-body-green-knowledge-search #user-profile {
margin-left: auto !important;
margin-right: auto !important;
}


/* Dead Weight */
#y-body-green-knowledge-search #content #just-middle .connections_left
 {
 float: none !important;
 }
/*=======================================*/
